metadata.title: CVE-2019-10187 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in moodle before versions 3.7.1, 3.6.5, 3.5.7. Users withpermission to delete entries from a glossary were able to delete entriesfrom other glossaries they did not have direct access to.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
